title: Holy Idol - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Celebrities   Famous Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Priests   Showbiz   Singers   Transmigration
author: 신화진
description:
The High Priest Rembrary who is loved by everyone.

Suddenly found himself in the body of a member of a 3 year nuclear submarine idol group!

“I am an idol? What is an idol?”

“What is with that way of talking? Did you fall asleep while reading a strange book again?!”

“I am truly perplexed. Calm thy self.”

“Ah, I told you to stop catching weird concepts! Please talk normally!”>
